stories.title: Digital Communication Platform
stories.description: Developed a digital communication platform that visualizes municipal infrastructure projects and enables citizen participation in sustainable urban development. The platform creates transparency and promotes acceptance for sustainable urban projects through real-time progress tracking and interactive participation opportunities.

stories.title: What's Netz - Energy Grid Simulation
stories.description: Created an interactive energy grid simulation that makes complex network structures understandable through gamification elements. The application serves as an educational tool for politicians, media, and schools, demonstrating how energy networks function and how municipalities can actively shape the energy transition.

stories.title: Digital Services Platform
stories.description: Developed innovative digital solutions for an aging society, including personalized services and AI-based visual experiences. The comprehensive platform combines technological innovation with service excellence to redefine modern living for seniors.
